code: import React,{useState}from'react';import PurblePairs from'../games/purble-game/PurblePairs';import AppleCatcher from'../games/apple-game/AppleCatcher';import'../css.components/BoostTab.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BoostTab=()=>{const[activeGame,setActiveGame]=useState(null);const handleVictory=()=>{setActiveGame(null);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"boost",children:!activeGame?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"game-selection",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"\u0412\u044B\u0431\u0435\u0440\u0438\u0442\u0435 \u043C\u0438\u043D\u0438-\u0438\u0433\u0440\u0443"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"gameBTN",onClick:()=>setActiveGame('PURBLE_PAIRS'),children:"Purble Pairs"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"gameBTN",onClick:()=>setActiveGame('APPLE_CATCHER'),children:"Apple Catcher"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"game-container",children:[activeGame==='PURBLE_PAIRS'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PurblePairs,{onVictory:handleVictory}),activeGame==='APPLE_CATCHER'&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppleCatcher,{onGameOver:handleVictory})]})});};export default BoostTab;
